name: kriit-grading
description: AI-powered code evaluation and grading assistant for Kriit learning management system

scripts.setup: test -f .env && echo '.env already exists - not overwriting' || (cp .env.example .env && echo 'Created .env - please configure your API credentials')
scripts.start: source .env 2>/dev/null; PORT=${WEB_PORT:-3000}; lsof -ti:$PORT | xargs kill 2>/dev/null; cd web && bun run build && PORT=$PORT bun build/index.js

author: Kriit
